languages.text: {n}Подступы к книге прекрасно просматриваются. Если Капеллан говорит правду и он знает всех гостей в лицо — то запись мог оставить только кто-то, свободно перемещающийся по двору, на кого никто не обратит внимания...{/n}

{n}The area around the book is completely open. If Chaplain is telling the truth and he really does know all the guests by sight, then the words could only have been left by someone with free run of the courtyard, someone who wouldn't attract attention...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Подступы к книге прекрасно просматриваются. Если Капеллан говорит правду и он знает всех гостей в лицо — то запись мог оставить только кто-то, свободно перемещающийся по двору, на кого никто не обратит внимания...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The area around the book is completely open. If Chaplain is telling the truth and he really does know all the guests by sight, then the only one who could've left those words would be someone who has free run of the courtyard, someone who wouldn't attract anyone's attention...{/n}

{n}The area around the book is completely open. If Chaplain is telling the truth and he really does know all the guests by sight, then the only one who could've left those words would be someone who has free run of the courtyard, someone who wouldn't attract anyone's attention...{/n}

languages.text: {n}悼念册周边的区域大敞四开。如果牧师说的是实话，如果他真的对所有客人都了如指掌，那么那些字只可能是某个可以自由进出院子的人留下的，而且那个人绝对不会引起任何人注意……{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The area around the book is completely open. If Chaplain is telling the truth and he really does know all the guests by sight, then the words could only have been left by someone with free run of the courtyard, someone who wouldn't attract attention...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}悼念册周边的区域大敞四开。如果牧师说的是实话，如果他真的对所有客人都了如指掌，那么那些字只可能是某个可以自由进出院子的人留下的，而且那个人绝对不会引起任何人注意……{/n}

languages.text: {n}El libro está en una zona totalmente abierta. Si Capellán dice la verdad y conoce la cara de todos los invitados, solo podría haber dejado esas palabras alguien con permiso para circular libremente por el patio, alguien que no llame la atención...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The area around the book is completely open. If Chaplain is telling the truth and he really does know all the guests by sight, then the words could only have been left by someone with free run of the courtyard, someone who wouldn't attract attention...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El libro está en una zona totalmente abierta. Si Capellán dice la verdad y conoce la cara de todos los invitados, solo podría haber dejado esas palabras alguien con permiso para circular libremente por el patio, alguien que no llame la atención...{/n}

languages.text: {n}追悼の書が置かれている場所は完全に開けている。教戒官の言うとおり、彼がすべての参列者を知っているのであれば、この言葉を書き残したのは中庭を自由に出入りできて、人の目を引かない誰かである可能性が高い…{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The area around the book is completely open. If Chaplain is telling the truth and he really does know all the guests by sight, then the words could only have been left by someone with free run of the courtyard, someone who wouldn't attract attention...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}追悼の書が置かれている場所は完全に開けている。教戒官の言うとおり、彼がすべての参列者を知っているのであれば、この言葉を書き残したのは中庭を自由に出入りできて、人の目を引かない誰かである可能性が高い…{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Bereich rund um das Buch ist von allen Seiten zugänglich. Wenn Ordenspriester die Wahrheit sagt und er wirklich alle Gäste vom Sehen kennt, können die Worte nur von jemandem mit freiem Zugang zum Hof niedergeschrieben worden sein, der zudem keine Aufmerksamkeit erregt ...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The area around the book is completely open. If Chaplain is telling the truth and he really does know all the guests by sight, then the words could only have been left by someone with free run of the courtyard, someone who wouldn't attract attention...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Bereich rund um das Buch ist von allen Seiten zugänglich. Wenn Ordenspriester die Wahrheit sagt und er wirklich alle Gäste vom Sehen kennt, können die Worte nur von jemandem mit freiem Zugang zum Hof niedergeschrieben worden sein, der zudem keine Aufmerksamkeit erregt ...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le livre est placé dans une zone complètement ouverte. Si Chapelain connaît vraiment tous les invités, alors seule une personne pouvant accéder librement à la cour aurait pu laisser ces mots. Une personne à laquelle nul ne ferait véritablement attention...{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The area around the book is completely open. If Chaplain is telling the truth and he really does know all the guests by sight, then the words could only have been left by someone with free run of the courtyard, someone who wouldn't attract attention...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le livre est placé dans une zone complètement ouverte. Si Chapelain connaît vraiment tous les invités, alors seule une personne pouvant accéder librement à la cour aurait pu laisser ces mots. Une personne à laquelle nul ne ferait véritablement attention...{/n}

languages.text: {n}Defterin etrafındaki alan tamamen açık. Papaz doğruyu söylüyorsa ve tüm konukları gözünün ucuyla tanıyabiliyorsa bunları yazan kişi, avluya rahatça girip çıkabilen ve dikkat çekmeyen biri olmalı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The area around the book is completely open. If Chaplain is telling the truth and he really does know all the guests by sight, then the words could only have been left by someone with free run of the courtyard, someone who wouldn't attract attention...{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kitabın etrafındaki alan oldukça açık. Papaz doğruyu söylüyorsa ve tüm konukları gözünün ucuyla tanıyabiliyorsa bunları yazan kişi avluya rahatça girip çıkabilen ve dikkat çekmeyen biri olmalı...{/n}
